meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by the parasite Toxoplasma gondii.
meanings.sent1: The toxoplasmic infection affected the cat's behavior.
meanings.sent2: The toxoplasmic parasite can be harmful to pregnant women.
meanings.sent3: The toxoplasmic cat seemed to think it was the king of the house.
meanings.sent4: Her toxoplasmic obsession with cleanliness was like a never-ending battle.
meanings.sent5: The toxoplasmic nature of the parasite made it difficult to eradicate.

meanings.definition: Infected with or carrying the parasite Toxoplasma gondii.
meanings.sent1: The toxoplasmic mouse was a danger to the other animals.
meanings.sent2: She was diagnosed as toxoplasmic after the blood test results.
meanings.sent3: The toxoplasmic squirrel was the talk of the forest.
meanings.sent4: His toxoplasmic presence in the office was like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The toxoplasmic contamination spread quickly among the livestock.
